Title: Fastening Days
Description:
['Yoji and Kei, a boy and girl,  live in a town in the not-so-distant future with their foster parent, Anna. But these seemingly ordinary children have a secret hidden even from their unsuspecting mother.', '
', '
', '
', "
Yoji and Kei are superhero defenders of their town! With a flap of their capes, the two of them and their robot bear sidekick,  Oscar, protect the citizens in their town with their handmade high-tech machinery. But from what menace? And will our little heroes be able to overcome the  crisis about to threaten the town's peaceful everyday serenity?", '
', '
', '
', '
Check out this utterly electrifying near-future animation to find out!', '
', '
', '
', '
(Source: Official website)']
Related: ['Adaptation: Quanzhi Gaoshou', 'Sequel: Quanzhi Gaoshou Specials', 'Prequel: Quanzhi Gaoshou Zhi Dianfeng Rongyao']
Staff: [['Ishida, Hiroyasu', 'Director'], ['Matsuoka, Hiroki', 'Sound Director'], ['Tanaka, Junichi', 'Script, Original Creator'], ['Perfume', 'Theme Song Performance']]
